todos.title: Translate booking button
todos.description: Add per-language translations for the Airbnb booking button and make `airbnb-calendar.js` pick the text based on detected language.

todos.title: Externalize translations
todos.description: Move calendar_labels and airbnb_texts out of locales/site-vars.json into separate per-language JSON files (e.g., locales/labels/fr.json) and update airbnb-calendar.js to load the appropriate file.

todos.title: Compare language file sizes
todos.description: Write a script to compare file sizes (or line counts) of all locale fragments and translation files, output mismatches, and optionally produce a merged diff report so files are consistent in size/content structure.
